title: Betting on the Devil
description: Sophia Thatcher always catches the wrong person's attention. First, it was the local San Valentin Triad group. Now, it's the King of Hell himself, Lucifer. Only this time, she finds herself drawn to him in a way that can only be supernatural.Most could be cautious when approaching the Devil, but Sophia throws it to the wind. He could be her only way out of the Triads and she never passes on an opportunity.
author: Emma Mohr
